name: Web Dev Path
description: It's is an open source project to provide a comprehensive path for tech professionals to work in a team environment.

name: Clockin.js
description: Full-stack app that allows you to have all your clients data, their clockins and invoices, in one place.
It presents an easy and straightforward workflow to control clockins and invoices.
techStack: React, MongoDB, Bootstrap, Redux, JSON Web Token.

name: Movies App
description: A BCIT team assignment front-end application which gets data from an API service and lists movies based on popularity, rating, and release date.

name: Home Seeker

techStack: Node.js, React, CSS, MongoDB, and Node-Mailer.

name: CRUD
description: Full-stack app to demonstrate the web system's basic principles for handling data:

name: Deck Master
description: An e-commerce application that allows managing user profiles and clients to purchase items using PayPal as payment.
techStack: C# / .Net, JavaScript, Paypal, MS-SQL, and Bootstrap.

name: Vue Calculator
description: A BCIT front-end assignment to build a calculator.
